QuestData.Title: My Father's Crossbow
QuestData.Description: I came here to visit my dad at the temple. As soon as I got here, I saw the most terrifying thing I've ever seen.$b$bIt was a mantid, walking right past me, carrying my father's crossbow.$b$bSomething's happened to my dad! We've got to find out what it is... but first, we'll need his crossbow back. I saw him heading west, behind the temple.
QuestData.RewardText: Yeah, this is dad's.$b$bLet's head on over to the temple. They'll know what...$b$b<Ku-Mo's voice catches.>$b$b...what happened to him.
